name: Steel Cyclone
help:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200 to all nearby enemies.
Ignores the damage penalty inflicted by Defiance.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Defiance.
Additional Effect: Absorbs a portion of damage dealt as HP
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
